data.name: Laser League: World Arena - Tu Lou Pack
data.detailed_description:
The new Eastern team joins the Laser League and immediately experience the elegant design from the Eastern team, creating your miracle on the field.
This additional game pack has three new player models, nine suits, two laser patterns and avatars, and an extra 500 platinum coins.
Responding to the call of miracle, get the Tulou series, the competition can be so elegant.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 @ 3GHz or AMD A 10-5800K APU @3.78GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Note: This title supports 64-bit Windows ONLY.
